name: Uncharted Realms
description:
Game Description

Uncharted Realms is a Single Player Point-and-Click Puzzle Game. The game itself is made in Unity3D but uses 2D assets and art to give the feeling of a popup book and fantasy. Players can interact with different interesting Organic shaped objects in the game and get in touch with the puzzles to escape.

Narrative Members

Daniel Hayward - Programming/VFX, Sounds

Zhihao Sun - Programming, Level Design

Ruilin Lan - Artist, UI Design

Soo Lee - Programming, 2D Assets

Sizhong Li - Level Design
